title: Add term name to tools variable substitutions

body:
test plan:
* add a new custom field, `term_name=$Canvas.term.name`, to an external tool
* open launch link to external tool
* verify that `custom_term_name` was part of the launch request and is correct

Thanks for the pull request! I left a few initial comments, and I'll reach out to the team in charge of variable substitutions and let them know about this to see if they have any additional feedback.
I'll pull this commit in and run it through our test suite.
Looks like there's one spec failure that needs addressing: `spec/lib/lti/capabilities_helper_spec.rb:106`
Fixed `spec/lib/lti/capabilities_helper_spec.rb:106` (was missing `Canvas.term.name` in the expected supported_capabilities)
Tests passed, but since it's the end of the day before a holiday weekend, we probably won't get this in until next week.
